revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SerComm |model=IP706ST |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/03/2003 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=OEM |type=wireless router |fcc_id=P270K30 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TNETW5305 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=ACX100 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=ADMtek |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} [http://web.archive.org/web/20060328112323/http://www.sercomm.com/web/download.nsf/a497d4d1b9607894482566a5000a6164/2072e5900db69c7148256d11003ab9dc/$FILE/ack301.img Firmware v1109 (via archive.org)]
The FCC test report specifies the CPU as the TNETW5305 ('''ARM7''') and the Flash and RAM size as 1MB and 4MB respectively (with ''Can Expand'' noted after the values). It also specifies the Switch chip as a Atan 8995L / AT8985P or '''Marvell''' 88E6052.. but the FCC image shows the device with an '''ADMtek''' Switch.
The default IP for this device is from the FCC manual.
The default SSID may be '''default'''.
